author: Danessia
title: Perfect location, kind staff and good price - Review
text:
We spent 3 nights in this hotel and we were positively surprised. The hotel has been recently renovated and the room we had ( superior room) was nicely decorated. Although our room was directly on the street, there was no noise. Room was clean with all amenities included ( shampoo, sops, hair dryer, water kettle, safe), breakfast (we took the option with breakfast included in the price) was acceptable and the price really affordable...for Paris.
Really plus point was the location: we were able to walk to the Louvre, to Notre Dame, Tour Eiffel, Place de la Concorde wishing 30-40 min maximum.And public transportation ( Metro) was at 5-6 min walk distance too.
Only minus point the Wi-fi quality in the room: very poor. Although it was ok in the lobby.
